divs: Sighting DetailsI was going out side my house to clean out a couple of coolers. I all of a sudden felt the need to look up in the sky. In the north sky I seen a boomerang shaped object glowing a soft red. It did a sort of hover spin thing and took off way too fast to have been military. I finished cleaning out the coolers wondering what i had seen. I went inside and told my dad about what I had seen. He thought I was kidding and told me to tell my friends at school that I needed to stay off the drugs. He was just kidding but I still thought he thought I was kidding. by a 12 year old
Summary: a soft glowing red boomerang shaped object
trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Salem
There were no other sightings in Salem on or around October 30th 2007
